sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="sys_user_group"> <sys_user_group action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <average_daily_fte/> <cost_center/> <default_assignee/> <description>When Pharmacy Advocacy accesses the ECM system.  Then role is available that is refined to only allow the user to generate a report showing information from cases that have a Business Unit as "Consumer Affairs" and a Product of "OptumRx". </description> <email/> <exclude_manager>false</exclude_manager> <hourly_rate>0</hourly_rate> <include_members>false</include_members> <manager/> <name>ECM Pharmacy</name> <parent/> <points>0</points> <roles/> <source/> <sys_class_name>sys_user_group</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>mike.ward</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-29 12:20:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>69795ade4ff0eb40699aacb14210c727</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>mike.ward</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-29 12:21:08</sys_updated_on> <type/> <u_allow_group_member_assignment>false</u_allow_group_member_assignment> <u_allow_submitter_escalation>true</u_allow_submitter_escalation> <u_onshore_offshore>Both</u_onshore_offshore> <u_source_id/> </sys_user_group> </record_update>
